turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order a pizza from Bal Elona.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get three pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get all three of them large, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what toppings would you like for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, can I get one Veggie Lovers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One meat lover's, and the last one just pepperoni and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large pizzas, 1 veggie lovers, 1 meatlovers, and 1 pepperoni and mushrooms, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but can I get them oped in crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add that to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total doesn't include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat the order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 3 large thin crust pizzas, 1 veggie lovers, 1 meat lovers, 1 pepperoni and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can I change it to pickup instead of delivery?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can switch that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's That's What is the total once again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
